rules.name: Marks of Chaos
rules.lore: The traiterous warriors of the Heretic Astartes call on the ruinous powers, attempting to draw their favor.
rules.text: When mustering your army, select one of the options below for each unit mustered. You may not select a keyword for any unit which already has any of the following keywords: +Epic Hero+, +Khorne+, +Tzeentch+, +Nurgle+, +Slaanesh+, +Chaos Undivided+

options.name: Khorne - Blood Fury
options.text: Gain the +Khorne+ keyword. Melee weapons which gain +[Lethal Hits]+ as the result of a Dark Pact score Critical Hits on an unmodified 5+.

options.name: Tzeentch - Warpfire
options.text: Gain the +Tzeentch+ keyword. Ranged weapons which gain +[Lethal Hits]+ as the result of a Dark Pact score Critical Hits on an unmodified 5+.

options.name: Nurgle - Spreading Sickness
options.text: Gain the +Nurgle+ keyword. Ranged weapons which gain +[Sustained Hits 1]+ as the result of a Dark Pact score Critical Hits on an unmodified 5+.

options.name: Slaanesh - Excessive Cruelty
options.text: Gain the +Slaanesh+ keyword. Melee weapons which gain +[Sustained Hits 1]+ as the result of a Dark Pact score Critical Hits on an unmodified 5+.

options.name: Chaos Undivided - Blood Fury
options.text: Gain the +Chaos Undivided+ keyword. Re-roll Hit rolls of 1.

restrictions: +Psyker+ units may not be given the +Khorne+ option.
+Character+ units with the Leader ability can only be attached to a Unit which shares the same keyword from the list above.
A unit may only embark within (or start the battle embarked within) a +Transport+ if both units share the same keyword from the list above.

spells.name: Veil of Time
spells.effect: Select one friendly unit with in 18". Until the end of the Battle Round, you may re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit.

spells.name: Fury of the Ancients
spells.effect: Select one visible enemy Model within 18". Draw a line between any part of this model's base and any part of the selected model's base (or hull). The selected model's unit, and every other enemy unit that this line passes over or through, suffers 1 Mortal Damage

spells.name: Psychic Fortress
spells.effect: Until the end of the Battle Round, friendly units within 6" have a 5++ Invulnerable Save.

strategems.name: Eternal Hate
strategems.when: Immediately after an enemy unit selects a Fight target.
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Battle Round, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, roll d6, adding 1 to the result if it is a +Khorne+ unit. On a 4+, the destroyed models fight back before being removed from play.

strategems.name: Skinshift
strategems.when: At the start of the Battle Round
strategems.effect: One model in your unit regains up to 3 Health. In addition, if your unit is a +Tzeentch+ unit below starting strength, one destroyed non-+Character+ model is returned to your unit at full Health.

strategems.name: Dark Obscuration
strategems.when: Immediately after an enemy unit selects a Shoot target
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Battle Round, your unit has the Stealth ability. In addition, if your unit is a +Nurgle+ unit, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

strategems.name: Unnatural Swiftness
strategems.effect: For this Activation, your unit may Shoot or Charge after making a Fall Back move. In addition, if your unit is a +Slaanesh+ unit, your unit may Shoot or Charge after making an Advance move.

strategems.name: Profane Zeal
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Activation, whenever your unit makes an attack, you may re-roll the Wound roll.
